newsitem.title: USA: Headway amends 6 and 9 mths results.
newsitem.headline: Headway amends 6 and 9 mths results.

text.p: Headway Corporate Resources Inc said Friday it amended for the nine month period ending September 30, 1996, and six month period ending June 30, 1996, its 1996 results.
The amendments have been filed as a result of a one-time non-cash adjustment and affects the company's reported earning per share only.
It's a regulatory adjustment in connection with financing of the acquistion of Irene Cohen Temps Inc and its affiliates.
The full impact of adjustment has been realized in the none months ended September 30, 1996 in the form of a non-cash divided of $1,470,000.
After the adjustment, the company is reporting a loss of $0.10 per share compared to a previously reported profit of $0.14.
For 1996, the company expects to report revenues of about $56 million and net income in excess of $1.2 million, the company said.
